function.name: count_ducks_espn
function.description: Counts the number of ducks in page 21 of ESPN Cricinfo's ODI batting stats.

function.name: fetch_imdb_movies
function.description: Fetches first 25 movies from IMDb with ratings between 4 and 5.

function.name: fetch_wikipedia_outline
function.description: Fetches Wikipedia headings for a given country.

function.name: fetch_weather_san_francisco
function.description: Fetches the BBC Weather forecast for San Francisco.

function.name: get_cairo_max_lat
function.description: Retrieves the maximum latitude of Cairo from the Nominatim API.

function.name: find_hn_post_signal
function.description: Finds the latest Hacker News post mentioning 'Signal' with at least 36 points.

function.name: find_newest_github_user_tokyo
function.description: Finds the newest GitHub user in Tokyo with over 130 followers.

function.name: create_github_action
function.description: Creates a scheduled GitHub action that commits daily.

function.name: parse_student_marks
function.description: Extracts student marks from a PDF and calculates total Biology marks.

function.name: pdf_to_markdown
function.description: Converts a PDF document to Markdown format.
